CustomField.description: Used only to filter records out of the transitioning flow.
CustomField.formula: AND( End_Date__c <= TODAY(), NOT(Transitioned_to_Monthly__c), ISNULL(Termination_Date__c), RecordType.Name <> 'Monthly', RecordType.Name <> '20 Group - Monthly', RecordType.Name <> 'Online University', RecordType.Name <> 'PASE Program' )
CustomField.label: NeedsToTransition
